New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers became the fourth team in NBA history to win their first 15 games of the season.
Key Match Events: Ty Jerome posted 24 points and 8 assists on 9-15 shooting in the win against the Charlotte Hornets.
The Garland and Jerome pairing continued to work well, with a 130.6 offensive rating when both are on the floor and a 21.2 net rating.
Post-Match Reflections: Evan Mobley praised Ty Jerome's performance, saying he'stepped up tonight' and 'did a great job overall.'
Kenny Atkinson called Jerome 'one of our best players right now' and noted that his ability to handle the ball makes it easier for Darius Garland.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Isaac Okoro and Dean Wade left Sunday's game with ankle injuries, and Atkinson didn't have an update on either's return postgame.
